data.title: Mid to B Link Drone + Salvo Control
data.description: Push back Defenders playing towards B Link with your teammate following your utility, making it much easier for them to isolate angles.

data.title: Art + A Site Drone And Salvo Take
data.description: Take control of Art with this simple combination of utility, enabling your team to take more aggressive angles.

data.title: Full A Drone Salvo Delivery Execute
data.description: Here's an easy, yet effective way to execute the A Site. Defenders playing on site will have a difficult time holding it.
